text: Fentanyl/fluanisone (trade name Hypnorm) is a veterinary combination drug consisting of fentanyl (a potent synthetic narcotic analgesic with a rapid onset and short duration of action) and fluanisone (a typical antipsychotic and sedative of the butyrophenone class) for use in mice, rats, rabbits and guinea pigs. ==See also== * Hydrocodone/paracetamol * Hydrocodone/ibuprofen * Oxycodone/paracetamol * Oxycodone/aspirin * Oxycodone/naloxone * Morphine/naltrexone ==References== Category:Veterinary drugs Category:Combination analgesics
title: Fentanyl/fluanisone
